titles.title: New Overages in Crisis Areas Prevention Act

To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit providers of broadband internet access service from increasing rates or enforcing data caps or allowances during an emergency or major disaster, and for other purposes.
New Overages in Crisis Areas Prevention Act
NO CAP Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
New Overages in Crisis Areas Prevention Act or the NO CAP Act
This bill prohibits broadband internet access service providers from increasing rates or enforcing data caps or allowances during a major disaster or emergency, including a public health emergency.
